channel.title: Having trouble adding new items to a new shop
channel.description: well... in my spawn-config.cfg i added two new npc's to the area where all my shops were at (horvik, and zeke) and then i tried to go into shops and add this to make the new shop [code] shop = 19 Armour_Store 2 2 1155 100 1155 100 1155 10 1117 10 1075 10 1189 10 [/code] but it brought up an error? please help me? btw the last shop number before i added mine was 18 so thats why i said 19... im stuck help me?

item.title: Having trouble adding new items to a new shop
item.dc:creator: @RiiPiiNFtW RiiPiiNFtW
item.description:
@RiiPiiNFtW wrote:

Don’t post here then. Obviously the rules state that you must have tried yourself before asking for help. Hence “HELP” not HELP ME CUZ I IZ A NUB AND IM LAZY. I just spoon fed you. Learn to Ctrl + F.

Rule number 3 reguarding this board.

3. We are not a Spoonfeeding community. We do not teach in an oversimplified manner to discourage independent thought. We encourage independent thought, meaning you must help yourselves before requesting help. Failure to provide some sort of prior knowledge or work to the problem will result in a lock of the topic. This is final.

Read full topic

item.title: Having trouble adding new items to a new shop
item.dc:creator: @whogoesthere whogoesthere
item.description:
@whogoesthere wrote:

[quote=“RandQm, post:4, topic:417567”]Case duplicate is because the number is already used for another case,
so just use another number.

The other error can be that u didn’t put the code at the right place[/quote]okay got it to show up in the shop… but how do i declare how much you pay for them? because right now when you value it says “0 points”

item.title: Having trouble adding new items to a new shop
item.dc:creator: @RandQm RandQm
item.description:
@RandQm wrote:

Case duplicate is because the number is already used for another case,
so just use another number.

The other error can be that u didn’t put the code at the right place

Read full topic
item.source: Having trouble adding new items to a new shop

item.title: Having trouble adding new items to a new shop
item.dc:creator: @whogoesthere whogoesthere
item.description:
@whogoesthere wrote:

[quote=“zingerman111, post:2, topic:417567”]your not suppose to just add the shop and npc and voosh your done you also need to use the
case code since im not a fagg ill give it to you but you have to use the proper npc code im not taking
the time to search that up XD

Open up Actionhandler.java and put this near the other case codes that open up shops

[quote]case 211://dont add this but the 211 is the npc code for sirpercivel change it to your npc
c.getShops().openShop(80);
break;[/quote][/quote]i added that stuff but it didnt work… 80 = the number that i put for the shop right? i did that and got this errors

Read full topic
item.source: Having trouble adding new items to a new shop

item.title: Having trouble adding new items to a new shop
item.dc:creator: @zingerman111 zingerman111
item.description:
@zingerman111 wrote:

your not suppose to just add the shop and npc and voosh your done you also need to use the
case code since im not a fagg ill give it to you but you have to use the proper npc code im not taking
the time to search that up XD

Open up Actionhandler.java and put this near the other case codes that open up shops

case 211://dont add this but the 211 is the npc code for sirpercivel change it to your npc c.getShops().openShop(80); break;

Read full topic
